message:
PETERSON AIR FORCE BASE, Colo. (AP) -- NORAD and the U.S. Northern Command are cutting 79 staff positions amid Defense Department budget cuts, officials said Wednesday.

‎"It's the first cutback since Northern Command was formed in response to the 2001 terrorist attacks."

http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_NORAD_NORTHCOM_CUTS?SITE=AP&SECTION=HOME&TEMPLATE=DEFAULT&CTIME=2011-02-23-17-10-46
